1.   מטרת השירות

לנהל חוקים גנריים עבור פקדונות DIY.

באמצעות שירות זה ניתן יהיה לקבל חוק גנרי.

requests.summary: Receive accounts info and list of relevant profiles.
requests.description: receive accounts and customers data by subscription number.

projects.swaggerDescription:
The service gets the folllowing parameters from the login digital process 
    
        - subscriptionNumber - the user subscribtion number

      and returns 
    
        subscription Number and relevant data 
      
          List of customers of the subscription 
      
            List of related user accounts(JONI) from ODS. 
            
          List of Profiles
    
    Incase the approaching system is Business application or web The service will access the joni business tables, otherwise The service will access the joni private tables
    Data is retrieved from `##ODS##
projects.schema:
LoginResponse:
  type: object
  properties:
    subscriptionNumber:
      $ref: "#/components/schemas/SubscriptionNumber"
    originalUserId:
      $ref: "#/components/schemas/OriginalUser"
    firstName:
      type: string
      description: customer first name
      example: בינה
      maxLength: 14
      nullable: true
    lastName:
      type: string
      description: customer last name
      example: באגד
      maxLength: 20
      nullable: true
    foreignFirstName:
      type: string
      description: english customer first name
      example: bina
      maxLength: 14
      nullable: true
    foreignLastName:
      type: string
      description: english customer last name
      example: bagad
      maxLength: 20
      nullable: true
    dateOfBirth:
      $ref: "#/components/schemas/IsoDate"
    feeBank:
      $ref: "#/components/schemas/Bank"
    feeBranchNumber:
      $ref: "#/components/schemas/Branch"
    feeAcountType:
      $ref: "#/components/schemas/AccountType"
    feeAcountNumber:
      $ref: "#/components/schemas/AccountNumber"
    leadingBank:
      $ref: "#/components/schemas/Bank"
    leadingBranchNumber:
      $ref: "#/components/schemas/Branch"
    leadingAccountType:
      $ref: "#/components/schemas/AccountType"
    leadingAccountNumber:
      $ref: "#/components/schemas/AccountNumber"
    userOpeningDate:
      $ref: "#/components/schemas/IsoDate"
    personalId:
      $ref: "#/components/schemas/PersonalId"
    idType:
      $ref: "#/components/schemas/IdType"
    countryCode:
      $ref: "#/components/schemas/CountryCode"
    subscriberSector:
      type: string
      description: subscriber business sector
      example: 10
      pattern: ^[0-9]{1,2}$
      nullable: true
    websiteNumber:
      $ref: "#/components/schemas/WebsiteNumber"
    authorizedToOpreations:
      type: boolean
      description: is authorized to operate in the web\application
      example: true
    subscriberPhoneAuthorization:
      type: string
      description: the type of autorization to perform operations over the phone
      example: 3
      nullable: true
    subscriberTimestamp:
      $ref: "#/components/schemas/IsoDateTime"
    identificationQuestions:
      type: boolean
      description: is the user has identification questions
      example: false
    divisionType:
      type: string
      description: calculated division type
      example: BI
      nullable: true
    subscriberInvolvement:
      type: string
      description: subcriber ownership
      example: 1
      nullable: true
    greenMail:
      type: string
      description: Reference to the screen reading miles when there are non called miles
      example: 0
    Pilot:
      type: boolean
      description: is the user in pilot
      example: true
    favoriteCustomerBranch:
      $ref: "#/components/schemas/Branch"
    favoriteCustomerNumber:
      $ref: "#/components/schemas/CustomerNumber"
    tradeOnWebService:
      type: boolean
      description: is the user assigned to trade on web service
      example: true
    CustomersArray:
      type: array
      items:
        type: string
    profiles:
      type: array
      items:
        type: string
      example:
        - 1
        - 2
        - 3
SubscriptionNumber:
  type: object
  properties: {}
WebsiteNumber:
  type: object
  properties: {}
OriginalUser:
  type: object
  properties: {}
Bank:
  type: object
  properties: {}
Branch:
  type: object
  properties: {}
IsoDateTime:
  type: object
  properties: {}
IsoDate:
  type: object
  properties: {}
AccountType:
  type: object
  properties: {}
AccountNumber:
  type: object
  properties: {}
PersonalId:
  type: object
  properties: {}
IdType:
  type: object
  properties: {}
CountryCode:
  type: object
  properties: {}
TimeStamp:
  type: object
  properties: {}
CustomerNumber:
  type: object
  properties: {}
PilotsLeumiTrade:
  type: array
  items:
    type: object
DivisionAffiliation:
  type: object
  properties: {}
CustomerAffiliation:
  type: object
  properties: {}
InvolvementType:
  type: object
  properties: {}
GreenMailIndication:
  type: object
  properties: {}
MailToHomeAdreess:
  type: object
  properties: {}
AuthorizedInformation:
  type: object
  properties: {}
AuthorizedActions:
  type: object
  properties: {}
AuthorizedThirdParty:
  type: object
  properties: {}
User-id-ref:
  type: object
  properties: {}

authorizedToOpreations.description: is authorized to operate in the web\application

subscriberPhoneAuthorization.description: the type of autorization to perform operations over the phone

identificationQuestions.description: is the user has identification questions

greenMail.description: Reference to the screen reading miles when there are non called miles

tradeOnWebService.description: is the user assigned to trade on web service
